Title: WPF Reporting Engine
Description: Easy to Use, Straightforward reporting platform for WPF. Simply create a Xaml Template, then add any UserControl such as a chart or table.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
Easy to Use, Straightforward reporting platform for WPF. Simply create a Xaml Template, then add any UserControl such as a chart or table.

The community has given me so much through the years, its time to give back! Please find my totally free to use, abuse, sell and otherwise do whatever-you-please with code.

This project is an elegantly simple reporting engine for WPF.

Simply pass it a template UserControl, then pass it report elements. It takes care of all the of pagination and document generation for you. Then just chuck the output in a DocumentViewer and you are up and running!

There is a sample file included in the source so you can see how it works.
